title-group.article-title: RORTY VERSUS HARTSHORNE, OR, POETRY VERSUS METAPHYSICS

permissions.copyright-statement: © 2007 Metaphilosophy LLC and Blackwell Publishing Ltd

abstract.p: The purpose of this article is to explore the relationship between the thought of Richard Rorty and that of his former teacher, Charles Hartshorne. There are important similarities between the two, but ultimately the differences are more readily apparent, especially in terms of the battle between poetry (in the wide sense of the term conceived by Rorty) and (Hartshornian) metaphysics. Hartshorne is defended against Rorty.
